oSig.description: (optional) The SecurityHandler object to use to retrieve the signature properties. If not specified, the security handler is determined by the user preferences. (It is usually the handler that was used to create the signature.)

Returns: A `SignatureInfo` object that contains the properties of the signature. This type of object is also used when signing signature fields, signing FDF objects, or with the `FDF` object `signatureValidate` method.
